message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! It's a one-time offer, but I'm willing to start with a price of $180.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $120 is the highest I'm willing to pay.
I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm willing to compromise, but $130 is the lowest I'm willing to pay.
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'll meet you in the middle of my previous offer and your new one, so I'll counter with $145.
I'm willing to meet you halfway on the middle ground, but $135 is the lowest I'm willing to pay.
I'm not willing to go as low as $135, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll counter with $140, which is still a bit above your previous offer. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.
I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one, but $137 is the lowest I'm willing to pay.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'll meet you halfway on $137, but I'll add a bit to it. I'll counter with $142
This is my final offer, I'm willing to pay $139 for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher.
